body: It looks like this is a view lifecycle issue. viewDidLoad on the child controller is getting called before prepareForSegue is called or at least before it is completed on the parent. Looking around I see conflicting info on whether this is supposed to happen and I don't typically use storyboards so I'm not positive myself. In any case, an easy fix in your case is just to move your image setting code out of viewDidLoad and into viewWillAppear. The URL should definitely be set by that point and your optional will be unwrapped successfully.
title: Error in Swift 3 update - Unexpectedly found nil while unwrapping an optional value
